body.name: When the Innocent Avenge: A Historical Western Adventure Novel

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #1,499 Free in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #21 in Westerns (Kindle Store) #52 in Western & Frontier Romance eBooks #95 in Historical Romance (Kindle Store)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What does a mountain man, a bear, and a "left for dead" man have in common? Each are what the others need. They become like family as they seek the Nevada Nine. Then there is the red headed lady that seems to outsmart those she encounters while seeking the same outlaws the mountain man, the bear, and the back from the dead man are. When they all cross paths trouble and harmony clash. A good read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Interesting and a bit strange
reviews.reviewText: The story was interesting. Duncan, a man riding with an outlaw gang, displeased the leader and was beaten and left for dead. Yvonne was after her brother's murderer. When Duncan, with the help of the old man and his pet bear, sets out to stop the outlaws who tried to kill him he crosses paths with Yvonne. Duncan, Yvonne and Gus set out together to stop the gang of outlaws. They encounter some strange happenings along the way. It is a good story, worth reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars When the Innocent Avenge
reviews.reviewText: “When the Innocent Avenge” is a well written book It has some interesting characters which are easy to identify with. The problem with the book comes about with some scenarios that seem unbelievable in a true western adventure book.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When the Innocent Avenge A Historical Western Adventure Book
reviews.reviewText: This is a great story and wonderfully written about a woman seeking revenge for the death of her brother and Duncan Hale who the gang almost killed if not for Gus and a Bear named Banjo.The story is action packed for both Yvonne and Duncan but they find love and happiness The characters are very courageous and determined and the extended epilogue is very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars When the Innocent Avenge: A Historical Western Adventure Book
reviews.reviewText: This was a eventful surprising western story that will keep you reading. The events were very western. A must read for those who enjoy historical western Adventure books from Amazon at a special price and from a spell binding author.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Ethan westfield is a very good writer. Deep stories. have to pay close attention to keep up an into the story

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got scared with this one
reviews.reviewText: I think so far out of Ethan Westfield’s books, this one scared me the most. The usual elements that make his books stand out were definitely reflected here since there were a lot of bloody and dangerous situations here, not to mention the non-stop action. But the fact that the antagonist on this book is the most unstable, creepy, and the closest to the perfect epitome of evil I’ve probably ever read from his books, this books sent chills down my spine. Not only that but the danger of being female was cringeworthy but an absolute correct reflection of the time period and setting. I admired the writing style because there were times when the writing would try to lead you to think one conclusion but as you read, there is a totally opposite one instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sorry but not sorry.
reviews.reviewText: The more I read this authors work I think that Ethan is a female using a male name. Which is why the story is always all over the place. I'm not putting down female authors. Not at all. Whoever wrote it seems like they are searching /reaching for something they can't quite see. A direction, that seems insurmountable. Wish I could praise this story, but to me it wasn't even a story. Just a bunch of incoherent words. I liked the bear. I liked Gus. I did not like using a line out of the song As Time Goes By.But...I will read another book by this author.

reviews.reviewTitle: He’s been framed and is determined to get free
reviews.reviewText: He meets a woman - and together they struggle to find out who framed him - and clear her father as well!!! Seriously a great book full of danger, lies but trying to do their very best to get to the truth and a good life!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Ethan you're a wonderful writer I love your book, I laughed and cried I read this in 2 days I. Opulent out of down thank you Ethan
Great read for a rainy Sunday.

reviews.reviewTitle: Western Adventure with one danger after another
reviews.reviewText: Another action-packed adventure as Duncan Hale sets up to avenge the world of the gang he was once a part of. Yvonne Mahler is also on the trail of a wicked gang leader.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 8, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I liked the characters and the unusual alliance between Gus and Banjo. Yvonne was superwoman and I felt inferior hahaLots of action when a bad guy reforms anything is possible
